SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CASE WHERE 1 = 1
AND CASE_SJ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{caseSj},'%')
AND HASHTAG LIKE CONCAT('%', #{hashtag},'%')
AND SERVICE_CD = #{serviceCd}
SELECT AA.SERVICE_CD ,AA.SERVICE_NM FROM TB_CATEGORY AA JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT SERVICE_CD FROM TB_CASE) AB ON AA.SERVICE_CD = AB.SERVICE_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT AA.CASE_SEQ ,AA.SERVICE_CD ,AB.SERVICE_NM ,AA.CASE_SJ ,AA.CASE_CN ,AA.REG_NM ,AA.FILE_SEQ ,AA.HASHTAG ,DATE_FORMAT(AA.RGS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RGS_DT FROM TB_CASE AA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY AB ON AA.SERVICE_CD = AB.SERVICE_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND AA.CASE_SEQ = #{caseSeq}
